text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1997. ==Events== *1 March - Kølig Kaj is selected to represent Denmark at the 1997 Eurovision Song Contest with his song "Stemmen i mit liv". He is selected to be the twenty- seventh Danish Eurovision entry during Dansk Melodi Grand Prix held at the DR Studios in Copenhagen. ==Debuts== ===Domestic=== *14 September - Taxa (DR1) (1997-1999) *Strisser på Samsø (TV2) (1997-1998) ===International=== * Teletubbies (TV2) ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *1997 in Denmark
title: 1997 in Danish television
